actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to prohibit the use of appropriated funds to carry out or assist nontherapeutic research on living human fetuses.

summary.text: Prohibits the use of appropriated funds to carry out any nontherapeutic research on a living human fetus which is outside the womb of its mother or to assist any person in carrying out such research activity. Defines nontherapeutic research as research not designed to improve the health condition of the fetus through prophylactic, diagnostic, or treatment methods.

titles.title: A bill to prohibit the use of appropriated funds to carry out or assist nontherapeutic research on living human fetuses.
